TPWrittenObjects Class Reference

Maintains a database of all objects that have been written to the current object stream. More...

#include <tobjstrm.h>

Inheritance diagram for TPWrittenObjects::

List of all members.

Public Methods

void removeAll ()

Detailed Description

TPWrittenObjects maintains a database of all objects that have been written to the current object stream. This is used by opstream when it writes a pointer onto a stream.
